item.title: Dharmasthala case: Activist Mahesh Shetty Thimarody externed to Raichur district for one year
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Dakshina Kannada district administration has passed an order externing activist Mahesh Shetty Thimarody to Raichur district for one year, acting on a report of the district police.
Puttur Assistant Commissioner Stella Verghese passed the order on September 18 on the report of Deputy Superintendent of Police, Bantwal, the police said.
In the report to Puttur Assistant Commissioner, the Dy. SP referred to cases booked against Mr. Thimarody and expressed the need to extern him “in order to ma...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: ‘Society will benefit if PG students show commitment in carrying out research’
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vice-Chancellor of University of Agricultural Sciences (UAS) Raichur M. Hanumanthappa has said that if postgraduate students develop discipline and commitment and carry out research, farmers in particular and society in general will stand to benefit.
He was addressing students at the National Postgraduate Research Conference at the UAS in Raichur on Tuesday organised in memory of noted agricultural scientist S.A. Patil.
The conference was organised by the Postgraduate Directorate of Universiti...]]>
